experience.title: Industrial IT Intern
experience.point1: Developed an advanced system for detecting employee personal protective equipment (PPE) using computer vision techniques, enhancing safety protocols within the plant.
experience.point2: Contributed to automating the monitoring and control of PPE usage in sensitive production areas, improving safety and compliance.

experience.title: Software System Architecture Intern
experience.point1: Designed the core architecture of a new SaaS platform for a Moroccan startup specializing in online business creation, streamlining the process based on legal frameworks.
experience.point2: Developed web applications using Next.js, Spring Boot, Docker, and AWS, offering additional services such as accounting and business management to support new companies.
